name: Stickman Knife Shooter
description:
Here is the new Stickman game.
In the game "Stickman Knife Shooter" you should help the stickman hero defend king castle from the enemies

Use the hand to throw knife at the enemies and kill the enemies

Stickman Cannon Knife game has a easy intuitive control. Tap on the screen and pull to charge the knife and select the tension force. Release to launch the projectile into the enemy.

Two Game Mode
Deathmatch and War mode
You can use skills
Your default knife is karambit knife
7 Different Knife


This game 2d shooter game and very addictive and fun.

You can earn coin every kill. You can buy armor and strong fight. The stickman needs you. Help him.
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
